text: Yak dlya zhinok shcho distalysya menopause, yakshcho vy mayete budʹ-yaki sumnivy, yikh tymchasovi budete try misyatsya. Yak dlya tsykh khto ne menstruate, ta zroblyatʹ vidkryttya shcho vony ye vahitni, yikhni tymchasovi kintsi na dayuche narodzhennya. Budʹ khto kotryy BOH povahy, Vin robytʹ vse lehke dlya nʹoho
